Room.Name: Center Drive/Hofton Avenue Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Hofton Avenue and Center Drive.
Room.LongDescription: Center Drive heads south out of the intersection with Hofton Avenue, which continues to the east and west, running parallel to the City Walls. On the southeast, you can see the impressive Hofton Ziggurat, where all the top delegates go to discuss various matter of importance.
